attributes.action: Honour the peoples democratic decision and deliver on a real brexit
attributes.background: The people of the United kingdom made a Democratic desicion to leave the European Union, it is the responsibility of her magisties government to deliver on that desicion. If the goverment refuse to deliver on a real Brexit then how can they represent the people of the United Kingdom.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we don't know what you mean by "a real Brexit".

If you would like the UK to leave the EU without a deal you could sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235185
